channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Detecting and Measuring Confounding Using Causal Mechanism Shifts
item.description: This paper proposes novel measures to detect and quantify confounding biases from observational data using causal mechanism shifts, even with unobserved confounders.
